known_issues: Search shop input is not accepting typing (user cannot enter text).

existing_features.title: Replace the non-editable "Search shops..." control on the Customer Home Feed page with a real text input that accepts typing and focus, while keeping the same general layout (search field on the left, filter button on the right).
Implement client-side filtering of the displayed feed items on the Customer Home Feed page based on the entered search text (case-insensitive), without requiring any backend changes.
Add an in-field clear control (e.g., an X button) for the search input that clears the query and returns focus to the input, and ensure it does not interfere with typing.

projectName: Fix 'Search shops' so users can type and filter the customer feed
